attributes.action: Help the cutty sark trust to restore this great ship after the fire today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help the cutty sark trust by giving them a garantee that all money needed to restore this ship will be made avalible to them. As this is a national treasure it should be saved by the nations money .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
